author: jnosek1
title: This 5-Move Total-Body Circuit Annihilates Calories
text:
This 5-Move Total-Body Circuit Annihilates Calories Chisel your muscles and melt the fat covering them at the same time Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Nothing packs a metabolic punch quite like a fast-paced, total-body workout. This workout from Miami-based trainer Idalis Velasquez starts with a classic full-body movement that builds legs of steel, the barbell front squat. Sprinkle in uneven loads in the half kneeling curl and press, and the stability challenge of kneeling med ball slams, and you’re on your way to building a rock-solid core. 
Each round ends with a killer set of burpees to enhance cardiovascular conditioning. Advertisement 
Privacy Policy | About Us 
Using basic pieces of equipment you can find at almost any gym, this diverse mix of exercises with no rest between movements will annihilate calories. By the time you’re through with this workout, your metabolism will be roaring. 
Check out the new METASHRED EXTREME transformation program from Men’s Health for more workouts to stoke your metabolism. 
Directions: Perform the exercises below in the order listed. Barbell front squat, 10 reps Kneeling med ball slam, 10 reps per side Bulgarian split squat with pulse, 10 reps per side Half kneeling single-arm curl and press, 10 reps per side Burpee, 15 reps
